Part of the claim translates to English: Following a ban on church services, now a ban on using and displaying Bibles in churches."
The claim features a screenshot of a You: The city of Seoul, 'A ban on churches displaying and using Bibles.'"
The Seoul Metropolitan Government publis: 2020, stating that they "ban the use of shared goods (Bibles, hymn books)."
